title: Don’t Trust the Goddess - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   God Protagonist   Goddesses   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Precognition   Transmigration
author: Lee Bora   이보라
description:
[I cannot forgive you for using me, the God of Astrology, to deceive people.] 

If fraud is a skill, then Yoo Seolyeon who has a fraud skill score of 99, uses 100% of her talent to run a fortune telling shop. 

'Please save us, Goddess Diana!' 

Who am I? Where am I? Before I could even think, lots of people came in and the room falls into chaos... 

Yoo Seolyeon, a fraudulent fortune teller possessed the body of the Goddess Diana. 

Will her morale work on this world as well?>
